content: Awesome game with great puzzles and no ads.

Loved this game. Made me think and I even went back in a few levels that I didn't use all the cards to find alternate solutions, which I found some. Made me happy that a lot of them had pretty clever ideas and not mindlessly straight forward. 100% recommend for a puzzle game.

This wonderful puzzle game teaches through implication rather than direct tutorials. Simple concepts are combined into tricky brain teasers. Procedural moves represented on cards are used rather than fickle physics. The relaxing simple soundtrack is well designed for the feel of each world. A must-play with play pass.
Great puzzle game. Easy to pick up and play. My only critique is I wish there were more levels.
Loved it!
My only criticism is that there isn't a level pack I can give you more money for.
Awesome fun game. Worth the purchase. If they release another, I'll buy it as well.
Relaxing body and stimulate brain.
I thought it was a golf game, but it's a puzzle game. It's not bad, just not what I thought/wanted
A fun, not awfully difficult, but challenging enough puzzle game.
Fun
It's ok I was hopping for more golf rather than puzzle

Great game, very clever puzzles! The difficulty is on point, the music is relaxing, the art is simple yet effective. It takes a simple concept and expends on it with great success, loved it! ♥️ (Just be aware this is not a golf game but rather a sweet little puzzler that happens to be golf themed)
Invasive ads
It's alright. The game itself is well-made, but it's not really my thing.
Great puzzle game, you can play at your own pace, not punishing at all. Has good mechanics too!
I really enjoyed these puzzles. The new mechanics each world introduced kept things fresh and the difficulty ramp up was really well done. I only wish there were more puzzles!
I don't think I give 5 star reviews often. I'm kind of hard to please. This game is awesome! Totally worth 5 stars.

Great puzzles and great design Once you change language going back to English is quite difficult: loading languages with non Latin fonts is a bit laggy and you may end up tapping twice: this makes it easy to miss English (which is right after Thai) and there's no way to go back to the previous language
Super solid and accessible puzzle game.

Amazing game. I love puzzle games but usually it's all a little similar, but this was something new and refreshing. I had a blast. Wish there were even more levels and more variety in the music, but overall, it is really worth the money. Thank you.

What a great find! I had thought this was primarily a golf game, but it's actually a puzzler with golf as a motif. There are plenty of different surfaces and other mechanics to learn, great achievements, no IAP, and hours of puzzling to keep you occupied. Sometimes the answer is straightforward, sometimes very counter-intuitive, so keep after it and try an avenue you may have discounted as too obviously wrong before. Highly recommend.
Wish there was a hint button because it gets very hard

I usually like puzzle games but this just isn't for me. I wish I could get a refund. I guess I thought it was more of an actual golf game that still had puzzle elements in it as opposed to just a physics game. I'm not saying that it's bad for anyone else, it's just not my style.
Brilliant game. A real pleasure.
This is what every game should be. No ads, no paid content, beautiful design, challenging and fun.
Good puzzle game.
Can't believe I waited until almost finishing every level before wrighting a review! Very cool puzzle game. Love the way it involves golf.
Busy.. mostly. But liked it... 😊
Great relaxing, casual puzzle game. Watch out for red herring.

An enjoyable, simple yet challenging, puzzle game. The game is good about introducing the new mechanics so you understand how it works before presenting you with the harder puzzles. The relaxing music fits the puzzle motif very well. It took me roughly a total of 5 hours throughout a week to 100% complete and I like the touch of how the secret achievement is unlocked. ❤ If you have Google Play Pass I would definitely recommend and the lack of ads may even make the price well worth it if you dont
Very nice game 👏
Charming game, but offers no incentive.
Best combination of golf and puzzle you could ask for
replyContent: Thanks for the kind review :)

content: Very pretty and well put together game. A good challenge to work out without being frustrating.
replyContent: Thank you, glad you enjoyed the game :)

content: Fun idea, but no way to skip a level so if you ever get stuck it's all over.
This was a fantastic game no ads, challenging but not impossible. Hope theres more levels in the future fantastic job
replyContent: Thank you so much, happy to hear you liked Golf Peaks :)

content: This is an absolutely wonderful golf based puzzle game. It's constantly building in itself and rewards trying different routes. I completed 121/121 holes and I would come back. Great addition to Play Pass.
replyContent: Thank you, happy to hear you enjoyed Golf Peaks :)

content: An amazing puzzler with well designed levels that build on its mechanics. I only wish there were 500 levels and not just a few over 100.
replyContent: Happy to hear you enjoyed the game. During development we actually designed way more levels (around 300 if I remember correctly) but we had to remove the ones that we didn't feel were good enough to make the final game better :)

content: Great golf puzzle levels, introducing new surface mechanics intuitively in each chapter. I'd love to see some more levels, just with the existing surfaces, maybe even user contributed :)
replyContent: Thanks for the kind words! We toyed around with the idea of a level editor, but encountered some issues that prevented us from doing it. Maybe in the future we'll give it another shot :)

content: So fun
replyContent: Thank you! :)

content: A really good and relaxing puzzle game.
replyContent: Glad to hear you enjoyed Golf Peaks! :)

content: Fun puzzles, tons of levels. Gets hard after the first few worlds.
replyContent: Thanks, we hope you have fun with the game all the way until the end :)

content: A fun game about picking from a hand of cards that determine your shot and trying to navigate puzzles and obsticals. It does a great job of explaining the mechanics through gameplay rather than words, which makes the game feel more fluid and less like a wall of text to start. I completed the game in about 2 weeks, playing off and on during lunch breaks. A good amount of content for the price. I cant wait for additional levels and mechanics.
replyContent: Thank you for your amazing review, we worked really hard on making sure the game is as self-explanatory as possible and it's always great to hear that it resonated with players :)

content: Needs option not to keep nagging about logging in to google play.
replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear about the login issues. Can you send us more details regarding that at golf@afterburn.games?

content: It's a little more difficult than I like, not that that is a negative thing, it's just my personal preference for games, to be able to solve a puzzle without getting frustrated, which happens too fast for me. The game is beautifully designed, unique and interesting. Just a bit more tricky than I prefer.
replyContent: Hi, thank you for your kind words. The game does get more difficult as it progresses, but if you ever get stuck try coming back to a puzzle later and giving it another go :) Some of the worlds (like World 7) also contain optional puzzles (the ones with a small icon next to them on the Level Select screen) which you don't need to finish to proceed.

content: Amazingly unique puzzle game!
replyContent: Happy to hear you liked Golf Peaks! :)

content: No landscape support. Your deceptive and your trash.

Just don't like the gameplay. It's a little too simple for my liking. I found repetitive and it didn't keep my interest for very long. While I can see how some people would enjoy the game it just wasn't for me. The sound and visuals are great.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback :)

content: A truly challenging and an absolutely one of a kind puzzle game. Amongst the best mobile games I've ever had the pleasure to experience. Thank you for this! Will purchase this to support the developers as I've been currently playing it through play pass. Also I would like to thank you again for not holding my hand and having tips and hints. Seriously, one of the most captivating and truly brain tickling puzzle games I've played since Braid. Here's to hoping for more to come!!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your positive review :) Being compared to Braid is an honor!

content: So the game is fun, here is my complaint there is no explanation on what cards mean so the game becomes super frustrating because the rules and meaning are not given . Like some times you have to hit the hall out of bounds in order to complete the task an opening page giving more details would make the game more exciting. Yes you can cheat and go on you tube to look but that is no fun. I just want more directions maybe clues if you get stuck would be helpful.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback; we tried explaining the rules without words during the first couple of worlds, but we'll try to do a better job of it in the future :)

content: The term "game" is used loosely here its more of an interactive waste of mobile data
Thia game is Dope af! Love it good brain thinker. Also calms me down when i get mad.
replyContent: Glad to hear you liked it! :)

content: Finally completed! Great game to leave and come back to. Thanks 👍
replyContent: Thank you and congrats on completing the game :)

content: Fun, challenging and well executed game. Good Job!
replyContent: Thank you! :)

content: Very cool golf game for those who like to put some thought into the game.
replyContent: Thanks! :)

content: Great game with fun, smooth play, challenging and unique puzzles, and clean look. A little too short of a playtime though.
replyContent: Thank you for the kind words :)

content: Really nice and relaxing puzzle game, I highly recommend it. The card system is a nice innovate gaming system. Two Questions: 1) Will more levels/worlds be added? 2) What do the white 3 block triangles mean next to some of the levels? (Usually last 3 in each level)
replyContent: Very glad to hear that you liked Golf Peaks! 1) For now we don't have plans to add more levels, though that might change in the future. If you enjoyed GP, you might also like our next title - inbento! 2) This symbol indicates that a level is a "bonus stage" and doesn't need to be completed in order to proceed to the next world.

content: Instant classic
replyContent: Thanks! :)

content: Lots of fun with roughly 85% of the maps being pretty easy to solve. 10% of the maps I had to really think about or work backwards. The last 5% felt near impossible to see the solution. All in all its a fun game and worth the play through if you have Play Pass.
replyContent: Happy to hear you enjoyed the challenge :D

content: Great and very relaxing game, only issue is that it hasn't got many levels.
replyContent: Thank you for the positive review :)

content: The wonderful thing about Golf Peaks is how deceptively simple the game is. That under the elegantly simple graphics is a puzzle game that really makes you think about how to string your cards together to get from point A to point B. And the soundtrack is so amazing to boot, really making this game the total package. I've never been so sad to be finished with a golf puzzle game before in my life. Crossing my fingers for Golf Peaks 2!
replyContent: Thanks! If you enjoyed Golf Peaks be sure to check out our next game - inbento - which is a different puzzle experience, but it shares some DNA with this title :)

content: No ads! Very atmospheric, and gets quite challenging towards the end
replyContent: Thanks! Happy to hear you enjoyed the challenge :)

content: Short, but very challenging.
replyContent: Glad you liked it :)

content: unique
replyContent: Thank you :)

content: The game is fun and I am enjoying it, but it would be helpful to have a hint option available. Some when you start and others earned somehow. Not having any at all is frustrating when you are stuck. I do really appreciate the fact that it is ad free and so well done. It is really fun. I feel guilty for my above comment. Perhaps the point is to solve yourself? No matter what it is fun, great graphics and we'll thought out. Thanks!
replyContent: Thank you for your kind words :)

content: Great game. I love the progression and the puzzles do a great job of introducing new mechanics.
replyContent: Happy to hear you had fun with Golf Peaks :)

content: I would like more games like this

content: Crashes immediately after the first splash screen
replyContent: Hi, if you're encountering issues with launching the game, please open the Google Play Games app (it's a separate app), log out of your account and log back in; then try launching Golf Peaks again. If that does not help, please let us know at golf@afterburn.games

content: This is one of the best puzzle games on Android. While I find the game to be overall fairly easy, I find every level enjoyable and cleverly designed. What I especially love is how the game teaches you its mechanics. Instead of a tutorial, the game itself is designed to show you what everything does. To top it off, it has pleasant music, sound effects, and graphics to produce a great experience at a great price with no ads or microtransactions to interrupt the fun.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind review :)

content: I put 4 stars because the game look great and everything but the game deleted all my progress and couldn't end it

content: I really like it. Old idea, new concept. Graphics are really fun and the controls are easy. Got through the first world very quickly and just hope there is a whole lot more to come. Will keep you updated.

content: It's refreshing to see there are still mobile developers who are committed to delivering high quality games instead of relying on predatory practices. The only criticism I can give is the puzzles could be a bit harder and possibly have more than one solution or relying more on the 3d aspect such as having jumps of different levels. That being said, it is probably 10 times harder to design a level than it is the play it. Good job!
replyContent: Very happy to hear that you enjoyed both the game and our stance on monetization :)

content: I really enjoyed this game. The challenges were good (though farther challenges would have been very welcome), and the style of graphics/physics was cute. Solid puzzle game to tease the brain, plus pleasing to the eye. However some puzzles were not my style, as I prefer puzzles that require using every bits present to solve it. But only some of them disturbed me this way. And for people who like working through overcrowded elements to sort out what really matters, this is also just another plus.
replyContent: Thank you for the kind words. We intentionally designed some levels to feature more elements than necessary to make them easier for certain players, but we can see how that might be distracting for others :)

content: Waste of money. Terrible physics and childish graphics.
replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy the game. If you would like to request a refund, please let us know at golf@afterburn.games

content: I love this game, it is worth spending money for this game, there are few levels but it is very cool, and the music sets very well.

content: Well done! Had to charge for this one - too good!

content: Feels like a golf CCG. You have puzzles and cards and the goal is to make it to the hole. There are traps like sand and clay and you have to call whether you need to play the wedge/jump card to get ahead, or have the ball keep moving so it doesn't get absorbed in the clay/quicksand. The cards also include amounts of spaces to travel on the grid. The puzzles have a predetermined set of cards so at least it isn't too random.
replyContent: Thank you for the detailed review :)

content: Fantastic little game. Great for phones.
replyContent: Thank you very much :)

content: Awesome
replyContent: Thanks, glad you liked it!

content: Simple, yet complex fun! Love how each new stage(or area) has a new concept to learn and master!
replyContent: Thanks, glad to hear you've enjoyed the variety :)

content: It's brilliant! Except.. On a few levels, the platforms you are jumping from and to aren't lined up. There should be a 3D grid on the level, so you can see how many spaces you are moving and see where potential landing platforms are in relation to the current space.
replyContent: Hi, during development we experimented with adding a toggleable grid, but found that it muddied the visuals and made things confusing for new players so we opted against it, and instead made most of the complex-looking levels optional :)

content: Fun puzzle game, well designed and has enough variety as you progress through the levels.
replyContent: Thanks, glad to hear you enjoyed Golf Peaks! :)

content: Simple chill puzzle game. It runs well and has great controls. The puzzles are pretty meh though in my opinion, I felt like they could have done a lot more to push the boundaries and make you think outside of the box a bit more. That being said, for a few hours of chill fun, its not too bad.
replyContent: Glad to hear you enjoyed the game :)

content: Fun, challenging, and unique.
replyContent: Thank you! :)

content: Easily 3 dollars worth. You can feel the thought behind each puzzle, and there's a good variety of challenges to be had. I enjoy that each new gimmick is introduced with an easy level that allows you to discover it through trial and error. My feedback is to highlight the path your ball will take before the stroke (would help with the isometric perspective), and to more clearly differentiate between the bunker and quick sand tiles (I tend to get them mixed up).
replyContent: Thanks :) We've actually experimented with highlighting the path before hitting the ball, but found out that for some players it made it too tempting to simply brute-force through some of the puzzles, so we opted against it.

content: One of the few games I've ever 100%. Really relaxing puzzler. Complete at 121... 120!
replyContent: Thanks, hope you enjoyed the bonus puzzle :)

content: I love this game! Some puzzle games lose their flavour after a while, but not this one. Some of the puzzles are truly fiendish, but are totally solvable. At present, puzzle 9-12 is melting my brain!!! I'm sure I'll solve it soon! EDIT: Just worked it out!!! This game is pure evil!!!
replyContent: Happy to hear you've managed to get through that tricky puzzle! :D

content: Fantastic game, simple to get into, but the harder levels are worthwhile puzzles. The levels are well designed, providing a good introduction to the mechanics and showcasing effectively how they work.

content: Good fun and challenging. Very slick presentation, nice graphics and easy to use controls. Definitely written for touch screen devices (unlike some of the clumsy mouse ports you get on here). There is a good level of progression here and some of the levels look impossibly daunting at first viewing, but working methodically reveals the solution. I've just finished all the levels, it took several weeks of casual play.
replyContent: Happy to hear you enjoyed the game - we developed Golf Peaks from the ground-up for mobile devices so it's good to hear that you found the controls intuitive :)

content: Great little puzzle game with simple rules and a great visual style
replyContent: Thanks!

content: Fun game, challenging puzzles.
replyContent: Thank you, glad to hear you had fun :)

content: Interesting and fun variation on a classic puzzle trope. Yet it could be more polished: some level solutions feel deeply unsatisfying (as if I found shortcuts to what the developer intended, eg. lvl 6.5), the cards could be more thematic (picture and name of corresponding club) and more generally the graphics are functional but bland.
replyContent: Glad you enjoyed the game. Some levels have intentional shortcuts - it usually occurs in levels where we felt that the "intended solution" was a bit too difficult to find for most players so we added an extra card. We also experimented with different clubs on cards (tried 10+ variants) but felt that it distracted people too much from the numbers :)

content: Most puzzle games either sacrifice a bit of theme for the mechanics (and end up at least a bit abstract), or miss depth because the theme takes priority. Golf peaks is an exception in this. Google asked me if this was a golf game, and it is. When on a course, it's easy to imagine your cards as different strokes to play. A second, equally important, part of the game is the difficulty and learning curve. These not just make sense, but make for fun and well designed levels. Absolutely recommend!

content: I was looking for a relaxing, easy to pick up puzzle game, without in-app purchases or ads. Golf Peaks is those things, and much more. At it's heart the game is very simple: a series of themed areas with a dozen stages on each to clear. Each area introduces a new mechanic, and these mechanics build atop one another as the game progresses.   What is brilliant about Golf Peaks is how it makes learning so effortless. There are no tutorials or text bubbles to work through. The game wordlessly introduces a concept, lets you figure out and then understand that concept, and then slowly folds it into the game so you lean how to apply it in more and more contexts. It's much like learning a language: by the end of the game, you'll see a huge, complex board and know how to read it, because of what you learned on prior levels. It is NOT easy to design a game that works this beautifully, with such a gentle learning curve.   I loved every minute of this game and am looking forward to more from the developer. No ads, no game play throttles, no BS. Just pure, simple, superbly designed puzzles in a fun and relaxing package.
replyContent: Thanks, we're super happy to hear that you enjoyed the experience so much :)

content: One of the best examples there is of why you should buy mobile games instead of playing free ones. No microtransactions, no predatory marketing.
